yuddhaya pawathi kalaye mathrubhumiya beragannata kondesiyakin bandimakin thorawa janathawa ekathuwuna se janatha rallak, janatha pelagasmak pereda (27) dawasa thula kriyathmaka wu bawa dakunu palath pradhana amathi shan wijelal da silwa mahatha pawasayi.pasugiya mathiwaranawaladi janadhipathithuma pramukha eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya kerehi me rate janathawa thabu wishwasaya ha balaporoththuwa abamal renuwakin wenas wi nathi bawa pereda (27) janatha pelagasma thahawuru kala bawa maha amathithuma kiyayi.mathrubhumiye swadhinathwayata, swairibhawayata saha bhaumika akhandathawayata lokaye monatharam prabala ratak, prabala sanwidhanayak wuwada ratak hatiyata apa nosali sitina bawa pennum kale yayi da ee mahatha kiyayi..

apoyi naha astha grahayek uchcha grahayek ekka idima nicha bhanga raja yogayak lesa salakanne naha.namuth astha grahaya inne nicha wela nam yogaya thiyenawa.2)budha grahaya nicha mina rashiyatayi.minayata uchicha sikuruyi.ee anuwa mina rashiye budha,sikuru yoga wana wita adala nicha bhanga yogaya yedenawa.(mehidi grahayan pihitana anshaka anuwa yogaye prabhalathawa adu wadi wenawa.mita amatharawa reka yogath salakiya yuthuyi.)hendrik silwa mahathage "jiwithaya ha grahayo" pothe oba laga athnam ehi budha sikuru yogayata athi wisthara kiyawanna.mina rashiye budha sikuru yogaya pihitana wita eya itha usas kala yogayak.nithi anshayatath hodayi.thikshana danuma athi winiwida dakina ayek.jyothisha shasthrayath ee ayata hodata pihitanawa.

me rate dakmak sahitha deshapalanagnyayekuta kiyala inne ranil wikramasinha witharayi.eda ejapa rajaye labalama amathiwarayek widiyata ohu karapu dewal diha balana kota hithenawa ohu yugayata idiriyen siti nayakayek kiyala.yowun puraya eka udaharanayak.meka singapuruwe li kwan yu karapu ekak.habayi li kwan yu wadath widyathmakawa kala.aakalpa wardhanaya pamanak nowe buddhimath tharuna tharuniyan hadunwadimatath ohu kriya kala.lankawe yowun puraya thibune ekaparayi.bauddha mullawarunge wirodhaya nisa karanna bari wuna.thorathuru thakshanaya hadunwa dennath mul wune ranil. 1999 di janathawa samanga mage sammuthiyeth ohu thamange nuthanawadi adahas penwa di thibenawa. 2015 lanka deshapalanaye harawum lakshayak.kapati rawatilikara wadawasam deshapalanaya wenuwata shishta nuthanawadi nambauruwak dan apa hamuwe thibenawa.
